snippet: Friends caught up at Mighty Quinn’s Barbeque in the East Village, which recently opened a restaurant and offers slow-cooked meats using two types of techniques.
abstract: Scene at Mighty Quinn's Barbeque, East Village restaurant spinoff of popular smoked meat stand at Smorgasburg bazaar, described as friends dine.
lead_paragraph: Friends caught up at Mighty Quinn’s Barbeque in the East Village, which recently opened a restaurant and offers slow-cooked meats using two types of techniques.

headline.seo: In the Battle of Smoked Meats, Back for More at Mighty Quinn’s Barbeque
headline.main: Bricks and Mortar for Artisanal Brisket
